name: EffectiveNicotineIntervention
title: Effective Nicotine Intervention
description: Effective intervention for when the patient has an urge to use nicotine substances (for example wants to smoke a cigarette). An example would be if asking that the patient take a glass of water when they feel the urge to smoke has been effective for this patient.

element.definition: Effective intervention for when the patient has an urge to use nicotine substances (for example wants to smoke a cigarette). An example would be if asking that the patient take a glass of water when they feel the urge to smoke has been effective for this patient.
